author: lgo
msg: Reduce the number of reallocations needed when working with string buffers.
Valgrind shows that the my__realloc function is called an awful lot of times
This change introduces a new function that makes it easy to create a string
buffer with an estimated buffer size.
(svn_stringbuf_create_ensure): New function definition. Creates an empty
stringbuf with the requested buffer size.
(create_stringbuf): Take a minimum buffer size argument.
(svn_stringbuf_ncreate): Use the new function svn_stringbuf_create_ensure as
(xml_escape_attr, svn_xml_make_open_tag_hash): Estimate the size of the
target string, use that to create a new string buffer.
